DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy olaparib combination paclitaxel carboplatin ( AUC4 ) compare carboplatin ( AUC6 ) paclitaxel alone patient advanced ovarian cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Efficacy Safety Olaparib When Given Combination With Carboplatin Paclitaxel , Compared With Carboplatin Paclitaxel Patients With Advanced Ovarian Cancer
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed serous ovarian cancer Patients receive 3 previous platinum contain treatment progression free least 6 month follow end last platinum treatment At least one lesion suitable accurate repeat measurement Patients receive systemic anticancer chemotherapy , radiotherapy ( except palliative ) within two week last dose prior study treatment Hypersensitivity pre medication require treatment paclitaxel/carboplatin
DOC.keyword: Platinum Sensitive Advanced Serous Ovarian Cancer
